bettereyes.found: You rub the %s and it shakes violently in your hand.
bettereyes.found.shatter: You rub the %s and it shakes violently in your hand, then randomly shatters.
bettereyes.not_found: You rub the %s and it does not move.
bettereyes.n: You rub the %s and it pulls North.
bettereyes.n.shatter: You rub the %s and it pulls North, then randomly shatters.
bettereyes.ne: You rub the %s and it pulls North-East.
bettereyes.ne.shatter: You rub the %s and it pulls North-East, then randomly shatters.
bettereyes.nne: You rub the %s and it pulls North by North-East.
bettereyes.nne.shatter: You rub the %s and it pulls North by North-East, then randomly shatters.
bettereyes.nw: You rub the %s and it pulls North-West.
bettereyes.nw.shatter: You rub the %s and it pulls North-West, then randomly shatters.
bettereyes.nnw: You rub the %s and it pulls North by North-West.
bettereyes.nnw.shatter: You rub the %s and it pulls North by North-West, then randomly shatters.
bettereyes.s: You rub the %s and it pulls South.
bettereyes.s.shatter: You rub the %s and it pulls South, then randomly shatters.
bettereyes.se: You rub the %s and it pulls South-East.
bettereyes.se.shatter: You rub the %s and it pulls South-East, then randomly shatters.
bettereyes.sse: You rub the %s and it pulls East by South-East.
bettereyes.sse.shatter: You rub the %s and it pulls East by South-East, then randomly shatters.
bettereyes.sw: You rub the %s and it pulls South-West.
bettereyes.sw.shatter: You rub the %s and it pulls South-West, then randomly shatters.
bettereyes.ssw: You rub the %s and it pulls West by South-West.
bettereyes.ssw.shatter: You rub the %s and it pulls West by South-West, then randomly shatters.
bettereyes.e: You rub the %s and it pulls East.
bettereyes.e.shatter: You rub the %s and it pulls East, then randomly shatters.
bettereyes.ene: You rub the %s and it pulls East by North-East.
bettereyes.ene.shatter: You rub the %s and it pulls East by North-East, then randomly shatters.
bettereyes.ese: You rub the %s and it pulls East by South-East.
bettereyes.ese.shatter: You rub the %s and it pulls East by South-East, then randomly shatters.
bettereyes.w: You rub the %s and it pulls West.
bettereyes.w.shatter: You rub the %s and it pulls West, then randomly shatters.
bettereyes.wnw: You rub the %s and it pulls West by North-West.
bettereyes.wnw.shatter: You rub the %s and it pulls West by North-West, then randomly shatters.
bettereyes.wsw: You rub the %s and it pulls West by South-West.
bettereyes.wsw.shatter: You rub the %s and it pulls West by South-West, then randomly shatters.
